structure.unit: Inspection And Regulation Of, And Licenses For, Buildings, Elevators And Cinematographs

law.catch_line: Fees For Inspections And Safety Tests

text.section: For the inspection of a new installation, repair, or replacement of power passenger and freight elevators, hydraulic and electric passenger and freight elevators, hand power operated service elevators and temporary workmenâ€™s elevators.
For each safety test and inspection of elevators and devices as described in paragraph (1).
For the inspection of a new installation of a private residence elevator or an inclined lift.
